title: Fragments, late 18th century
description: Orange twill ground divided into hexagons by ribbon-like bands in extra green and white silk wefts.  Small floral spray in centre of each hexagon woven in extra wefts of blue, green, red and rose.  Twill in ground of hexagons runs right to left in one horizontal row and left to right in alternating row.  a/ and b/ have one selvage present.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, late 18th century.
late 18th century. silk plain compound cloth. Gift of George A. Hearn. 1899-10-27-a,b.
